description:
Gao and Batzz struggle against CHAOS Gao`s Autodeity Army, which is made up of evil duplicates of the Thunder Empire cards. Batzz begins to have doubts about his own abilities.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gao versus CHAOS Gao! Autodeity Formation Complete!
Kibaou VS Chaos Kibaou! Hatagami Formation Kansei!!
牙王VSカオス牙王! 機神フォーメーション完成!!
